officialTitle: The Exogenous Progesterone Free Luteal Phase After GnRHa Trigger - a Randomized Controlled Pilot Study in Normo-responder IVF Patients
inclusionCriteria:
* Age between 20 and 40
* Normal menstrual cycles: 25-34 days
* Oligomenorrhea/amenorrhea or polycystic syndrome (defined according to the Rotterdam criteria 2004)
* BMI \>18 and \<35 kg/m2
* Must be FEMALE
* Must have minimum age of 20 Years
* Must have maximum age of 40 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Patients with \>14 follicles on day of trigger
* Previous hyperresponse with OHSS development
* Previous low response (less than 3 oocytes on a high dose of FSH stimulation)
* Endocrine disorders
